title: Hey guys! (Sound & Music Forum Goers) I'm new around here - feel free to introduce yourselves.
body:
Hi, my name is Harry (Hurricane Harry is a nickname that has been given to me on several occasions for multiple reasons) and I'm from Australia. I'm a University Student who is currently completing a Bachelor of Contemporary Music. I like to listen to a lot of Alternative music (usually pretty clean, but I've developed my taste to the point that I quite enjoy a lot of heavier stuff immensely) so I'd say my favourite music to have come out of LoL would be the Vi & Jinx (the Jinx login theme actually got me into Djerv and a few similar bands) theme songs as well as a lot of the hallowing login themes.

To the Rioters who removed this yesterday - this is me introducing myself specifically to this area of the forums and getting a feel for the type of people in here (musical tastes, musical backgrounds, etc). DO NOT DELETE.

replies.body:
> Hi Harry!

Hey! (I really meant to check this thread for replies sooner - I was at a class from 5-8pm AEST D:)
great to hear you're studying composition in contemporary music - there actually aren't so many schools/colleges/universities in the world that offer that! usually it's only classical..

> great to hear you're studying composition in contemporary music - there actually aren't so many schools/colleges/universities in the world that offer that! usually it's only classical..

Yeah - a lot of my friends that I went to school with are studying classical music whereas only a couple of people I know went on to study contemporary music.
